sentences.en: British tour companies are nudging clients to travel further afield.
sentences.cn: 英国旅游公司正鼓动客户到更远的地方去旅游。

sentences.en: Do not go too far afield.
Don't go too far afield or you'll get lost.
sentences.cn: 别走得太远,要不然你会迷路的.

sentences.en: During their summer holidays they cruised further afield to Normandy and Brittany.
sentences.cn: 暑期他们乘船到更远的诺曼底和布列塔尼游览。

sentences.en: Journalists came from as far afield as China and Brazil.
sentences.cn: 新闻记者来自中国和巴西等远方国度.

sentences.en: Many of those arrested came from far afield.
sentences.cn: 那些被捕者有许多来自很远的地方。

sentences.en: Once he starts talking, he will go far afield from his original topic.
sentences.cn: 他只要一开始说话, 就会偏离原来的话题.

sentences.en: One day she wandered further afield.
sentences.cn: 有一天她游荡到更远的地方.

sentences.en: Some villagers have never been further afield than the neighbouring town.
sentences.cn: 有些村民从未远离过附近的市镇.

sentences.en: students who come from further afield
They were exporting as far afield as Alexandria.
sentences.cn: 他们出口货物远至亚历山德里亚。

sentences.en: To examine them in this book would take us too far afield.
sentences.cn: 在这本书里去讨论它们会使我们太离题了.

sentences.en: You are not allowed to bring plants in from further afield without a licence.
sentences.cn: 未经许可不得从外地带入植物。

sentences.en: You can hire a car if you want to explore further afield.
sentences.cn: 如果你还想逛更远的地方,可以租辆车.
